text:
[Verse]
In the night sky far and wide
Stars are counting can't hide
Shining bright in silent grace
Whispers in this open space

[Verse 2]
Feet on ground yet head in clouds
Life both quiet and so loud
Dreams like stars they come and go
Sparkling in their own glow

[Chorus]
Counting stars one two three
Think of what we can be
In the night we can see
Endless possibilities

[Verse 3]
Hands held tight we move along
Heartbeat acts as our song
Galaxy beneath our feet
Every step a rhythmic beat

[Verse 4]
Eyes that shimmer in the dark
Find the path and leave a mark
Constellations guide us through
Every star a sign brand new

[Chorus]
Counting stars one two three
Think of what we can be
In the night we can see
Endless possibilities
title: Counting Stars
